noun.description: A variety of black China tea.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in The Times. From Chinese(Cantonese) wùhbāk (Meyer-Wempe transcription upak) northern lake from Chinese (Mandarin) Húbĕi, name of a central province of China (from hú lake + bĕi north, referring to the Tung-ting Lake).
